description:
Freeware program that helps you easily backup and synchronize your files to: the same drive; a different drive or medium (CDRW, CompactFlash, etc); an FTP server; a Network; or a Zip archive.
**Note:** SyncBackFree cannot be used on server versions of Windows. Upgrade to SyncBackSE or SyncBackPro if you are using a server version of Windows.
author: 2BrightSparks
